tour.operationConfig: Click here to configure your Operation.
tour.operationSelect: Select your Operation here. This will define the operationId used in the requests.
tour.sendRequest: Click here to send the request.
tour.appCredentials: Define your App Credentials here. App Credentials can be obtained from your account on SARA console.
tour.saveApp: Select and save your App Credentials.

tour.config: Click here to register app credentials.
tour.appCredentials: Define your App Credentials here. App Credentials can be obtained from your account on SARA console.
tour.saveApp: Select and save your App Credentials.
